employee.greeting:
Hello {{name}}, I'm your Health AI Coach.

I've organized your comprehensive checkup results from {{visitDate}} at {{center}} by category, so you can see any abnormalities at a glance.
employee.choiceWithAbnormal: Do you have any questions about the abnormal results?
employee.choiceWithoutAbnormal: Do you have any questions about the checkup results?

guest.greeting:
